name: Jeremy Tran
position: Co-Founder - Asia Sustainable Travel Briefing; Founder - Sainha
introduction: Founder of Sainha, I am passionate about helping impact-driven travel and hotel brands and organizations grow and transform. I also co-founded Asia Sustainable Travel Briefing, a digital media network that serves up agenda-setting analysis & advice to Asia's sustainability-led travel & hospitality professionals, executives and entrepreneurs. An award-winning brand, marketing, and strategy communications expert recognized for combining forward-oriented visions, digital innovation, and entrepreneurial spirit to deliver substantial impact. A multilingual leader with experience in advising over 50 global brands on China market entry strategy, strategic communications, marketing campaigns, and sustainability.
how_can_help: Drive conversation and action around greenwashing.
sustainability_journey: Throughout my career in branding and marketing, I have had the fortune of working alongside many of the world's greatest brands to deliver consumer engagement campaigns that change how people view and engage in some of our society's pressing issues. The climate emergency has stood out as the most existentially threatening issue to humanity. The two climate disasters in 2020 - the devastating wildfires in my adopted home in the U.S. West Coast and once-in-a-generation floods in my native country Vietnam - hit home for me. I felt called upon to play an active role in the climate action movement.
sustainable_actions: I lead all business directions of my organizations from forming partnerships with other sustainability-led organizations to developing products to enable and amplify positive impacts.
challenges_overcome: I've overcome fear of public speaking by constantly practicing and mastering my area of expertise. Sustainability and the urgency of Climate Change require us to voice up and I'm glad to be part of it.
most_proud_of: I have built a community of over 500+ sustainable travel entrepreneurs, storytellers, and investors in 12 months.
